column1: I'll say it again — It didn't have to happen this way. Greg Abbott chose to pay the human cost to protect corporate interests rather than listen to the medical professionals and protect Texas families. Here are 4 of the real human cost stories of #COVID19: https://t.co/o1WRCk6iTn

Greg Abbott was warned. He ignored the experts and now Texas is one of the biggest #COVID19 hotspots in the world. Sign our petition at the link below if you agree — it didn't have to happen this way.   https://t.co/xWzSw18AFM

#COVID might have emptied stadiums but we're in the home stretch and the bases are loaded. The pressure is on for Texas Democrats to finish strong! Are you registered to vote? Double-check at https://t.co/8m8li3Z1oe and help us hit a grand slam this November! #VoteStartToFinish https://t.co/gwq4II5TUT
What Trump is doing to CDC is insane! He is jeopardizing the health of each and every one of us! #CovidCoverUp https://t.co/1Vf7EB3Fo7
This type of quote from TX Lt Guv Dan Patrick is exactly why Texans who voted for he and Abbott  2018 are now regretful. #covidisreal https://t.co/sYMBWGEHI3
We should all use caution but this report would certainly lineup w/the science behind COVID. https://t.co/KC6BmA8NUW

Maybe the dumbest thing Trump has ever said!! It’s a Novel virus b/c it’s new!! COVID didn’t exist when @BarackObama was POTUS!!! Maybe if you had paid attn during your Intel briefs!!! https://t.co/3it8zyntja

Our state is under strict orders: No more than 10 allowed to gather!!! This is a HIGHLY contagious virus! Will slow down a safe&responsible reopen of TX business when the time is appropriate! Alex Jones is a #COVIDIOTS  and Gov needs 2 enforce orders! https://t.co/8l65BYNCfr

@TherealTaraji I heard you on CNN this am. I’m a US congressman and represent Texas. I did a FB live last night on mental health while we are dealing w/COVID. Utilize local 1800 hotlines and even meditation apps. Everyone pls take this seriously and remember your not alone!

Because of the Affordable Care Act 20 million additional Americans gained quality affordable health care. Now more than ever we need to build on that and give uninsured Americans the opportunity to get insured under a special enrollment period for COVID-19. Enough. #Teamjoe
This is great news!!! now maybe Abbott can be a leader and help flatten the curve on COVID19 like some Texas cities already have taken the initiative and done. #Priorities https://t.co/kGU1trMGGN
UPDATE for @FortWorthISD students. We will continue to keep you informed as more information becomes available. #COVID19 #coronavirus https://t.co/48DEy0d52e
